alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; DeKalb; Gentry; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 1:22AM CST until February 27 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Southwestern Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Nodaway County in northwestern Missouri... Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 121 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fillmore to Amazonia to 6 miles south of Elwood, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Maryville, Savannah, Stanberry, King City, Union Star, Fillmore, Barnard, Conception Junction, Bolckow, Rosendale, Cosby, Guilford, Clyde, Arkoe, Rea, Conception, Ford City and Helena. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 53 and 54. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
